meanings.definition: A person who believes in communication with the spirits of the dead.
meanings.sent1: The spiritist held a seance to communicate with the departed.
meanings.sent2: She visited a spiritist to connect with her deceased grandmother.
meanings.sent3: The spiritist joked that the ghosts were on vacation and not available for a chat.
meanings.sent4: The old house was said to be haunted, attracting spiritists seeking contact with the afterlife.
meanings.sent5: The spiritist's room was filled with candles and incense, creating an eerie atmosphere for the seance.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the belief in communication with the spirits of the dead.
meanings.sent1: The spiritist rituals were mysterious and intriguing to outsiders.
meanings.sent2: She had a collection of spiritist books that explored the supernatural realm.
meanings.sent3: The spiritist decorations at the party gave a spooky vibe to the room.
meanings.sent4: The moonlit graveyard had an almost spiritist aura, making it feel otherworldly.
meanings.sent5: The spiritist symbols painted on the walls added an air of mysticism to the ancient temple.
